job.name: Sales Manager cum Office Manager
job.description:
Job Brief
A proactive, dynamic English speaking female to focus on actively seeking out and engaging customers (companies and individuals) in the luxury product market.&nbsp; The individual must be presentable, persuasive, and elaborate and possess very good communication skills.
Administration Responsibilities:
Maintains and ensure Quality administrative support, Attention to detail and problem solving skill.
Devising and maintain office systems, including data management and filing.
Arranging for travel, visas and accommodation and, occasionally, travelling with the manager for general assistance, Minutes of meeting.
Organizing and maintaining Dairies and scheduling appointments.
Deputizing for the manager and making decisions in their absence.
Screening phone calls, enquiries and requests, and handling them when appropriate.
Organizing and attending meetings and ensuring the manager is well prepared for meetings.
Using a range of office software &amp; managing filing systems.
Developing and implementing new administrative systems, such as record management.
Organizing the office layout and maintaining supplies of stationery and equipment.
Maintaining the condition of the office and arranging for necessary repairs.
Overseeing the recruitment of new staff, sometimes including training and induction.
Delegating work to staff and managing their workload and output.
Writing reports for senior management and delivering presentations.
Responding to customer enquiries and complaints.
Sales Responsibilities:&nbsp;
Have previous working experience in Sales &amp; Admin.
Have excellent selling, presentation, communication (writing/editing), and negotiation skills
Be able to prioritize, time management and organizational skills
Highly motivated and target oriented with a proven track record in sales
Have a positive attitude, detail and customer oriented with good multitasking and organizational ability
Responsive and manages time efficiently
Have customer-oriented and sales oriented mind-set.
Be outgoing and forward, and able to speak to a small and large group of people about the product
Be able to present, promote and sell luxury products in a convincing way
Develop, maintain and establish positive business and customer relationships
Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within a pre-specified schedule/timeframe
Coordinate sales effort with team members and management
Keep up-to-date with best practices and promotional trends (print/online/other platforms) and demonstrable social networking experience in prominent social media applications, platforms and channels (i.e. Instagram, twitter, Tumblr, Facebook, etc)
Ability to structure, creates, and delivers presentations tailored to the audience&rsquo;s needs
Listening to customer requirements and presenting appropriately to make a sale
Challenging any objections with a view to getting the customer to convince.
Create editorial calendars and syndication schedules
Set up and optimize company pages within each platform to increase the visibility of company&rsquo;s social content
Moderate all user-generated content in line with the moderation policy for each community
Continuously improve by capturing and analyzing the appropriate social data/metrics, insights and best practices, and then acting on the information
Supply management with reports on sales, customer needs, problems, interests,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;competitive&nbsp;activities, and potential for new products and services.
Proficient knowledge of MS Office and Email
Represent the company at trade exhibitions, events and demonstrations.

job.name: E-Commerce Manager
job.description:
MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:
Ensure accuracy of the content featured on the property&rsquo;s as well as third party websites where the hotel distributes inventory.
Establish relationships with corporate and regional office
Assist in reaching the targeted website sales and distribution goals.
Maintain and develop hotel website as a source of bookings/revenue;
Ensuring the feed of information to the main web influencer and managing the communication with the blogosphere.
Contribute to the hotel content for the brand website&nbsp;as required and according to the given deadlines and policies.
COMPETENCIES:
&nbsp;
Expert user of Google Analytics
A minimum of 2-3 years experience in a similar role
Passionate in achieving revenue goals Ability of U/X testing and multi-variant testing
Demonstrable experience of increasing revenue through U/X improvements&nbsp;
Relevant experience in web, hotel operations and revenue management is advantageous
Ability to generate innovative ideas and to &ldquo;think outside the box&rdquo;

job.name: Junior Sous Chef
job.description:
Ideal candidates will have the following skills &amp; experience:
Previous experience as a Junior Sous Chef / Senior Chef de Partie within a reputable F&amp;B or restaurant operation, fine dining or hatted restaurant
Hold relevant tertiary qualifications, such as Certificate III in Commercial Cookery
Experience working in a busy, fast-paced kitchen environment
Experience in Asian cooking (Wok skills will be an asset)
Strong understanding of produce, culinary techniques and kitchen equipment
The ability to effectively and efficiently co-ordinate and work as part of the team
Passion, enthusiasm and flair in the culinary space
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Keen eye for detail
Ability to work varied shifts, including weekends and holidays

job.name: Director of Sales & Marketing
job.description:
We are looking for a&nbsp;Director of Sales &amp; Marketing, an individual with a background and outstanding experience in the field of luxury hotels and a proven track record of achievements with previous employers in addition to solid academic qualifications.
In addition, we expect the candidate to have
Familiarity with hospitality revenue management
Leadership experience in a similar capacity and strong focus on teamwork/ management
A track record of active commercial accounts that might be relevant to the Hotels key feeder market segment.
Solid analytical skills and the ability to prepare and articulate the business plan&nbsp;
Strong network capability
Apt in global sales and client relationship management.
We expect the candidate to have a University degree in Marketing or related field and at least 3-5 years&rsquo; experience in the capacity of Director of Sales &amp; Marketing

job.name: General Manager
job.description:
Key Attributes:
Superb financial and commercial acumen is a must to develop yield strategies
Develop innovative strategies focused on brand presence and revenue generation
Proven track record with at least 12-15 years of experience within leading 5 star hotels and resorts
Should have worked for the last 5 years as a General Manager in properties
Strong operational background with hands-on attitude to daily operations and exceeding guests expectations
Decisive VIP ambassador
Natural leader and strategist
Great motivator and communicator
Able to lead the overall sales and marketing initiatives and develop business plans to achieve the targets and KPIs

job.name: HR Officer
job.description:
Maintain employee records (soft and hard copies)
Update HR databases (e.g. new hires, separations, vacation and sick leaves)
Assist in payroll preparation by providing relevant data, like absences, bonus and leaves
Prepare paperwork for HR policies and procedures
Process employees&rsquo; requests and provide relevant information
Coordinate HR projects, meetings and training seminars
Collaborate with the Recruiter to post job ads on careers pages and process incoming resumes
Manage the department&rsquo;s telephone center and address queries accordingly
Prepare reports and presentations for internal communications
Provide orientations for new employees by sharing on boarding packages and explaining company policies
Design and implement overall recruiting strategy
Consult with managers to discover staff requirements and specific job objectives
Write and post job descriptions on career websites, newspapers and universities boards
Source candidates by using databases and social media
Evaluate and screen resumes and cover letters
Use recruiting tools like tests and assignments to assess candidates&rsquo; skills
Conduct phone, Skype and/or in-person interviews
Provide a shortlist of qualified candidates to hiring managers
Help the hiring team with recruiting methods and interview questions
Contact new employees and prepare on boarding sessions
Prepare new hire paperwork ensuring legislation requirements are met
Maintain a complete record of interviews and new hires
Stay up-to-date with current recruiting methods
Requirements
Proven work experience in Human Resource Department
Excellent communication skills
Ability to prioritize and complete projects within deadline
Solid knowledge of HR policies and best practices
Hands on experience with various selection processes like phone interviews and reference checks
Ability to conduct different types of interviews (e.g. structured, competency based and behavioral)
Familiarity with HR databases, applicant tracking systems and candidate management systems
Ability to use psychometric tests and other assessment tools
Familiarity with social media, especially LinkedIn
Degree in Human Resources Management, Organizational Psychology or relevant field
Hand on experience with HR software
PC literacy and experience with MS Office applications
Knowledge of labor legislation
Excellent organizational and time-management skills
Teamwork skills
&nbsp;

job.name: Pastry Chef
job.description:
&nbsp;JOB SUMMARY
&nbsp;
Exhibits creative baking and decorating talents by personally performing tasks while leading the staff in preparing quality and consistent pastries for all areas. Works to continually improve guest and employee satisfaction while maintaining the operating budget. Leads development and training of team to improve results while maintaining standards. Must ensure sanitation and food standards are achieved. &nbsp;The ideal candidate must have experience in chocolate carving and cake decorating, as well as being highly creative and artisitc in his/her work.
&nbsp;
&nbsp;
CANDIDATE PROFILE
&nbsp;
Education and&nbsp;Experience
&bull; High school diploma or GED; 4 years experience in the culinary, food and beverage, or related professional area.
OR
&bull; 2-year degree from an accredited university in Culinary Arts, Hotel and Restaurant Management, or related major; 2 years experience in the culinary, food and beverage, or related professional area.
&nbsp;
&nbsp;
CORE WORK ACTIVITIES
&nbsp;
Leading Pastry Culinary Team
&bull; Utilizes interpersonal and communication skills to lead, influence, and encourage others; advocates sound financial/business decision making; demonstrates honesty/integrity; leads by example.
&bull; Supervises and manages employees. Manages all day-to-day operations. Understands employee positions well enough to perform duties in employees&#39; absence.
&bull; Encourages and builds mutual trust, respect, and cooperation among team members.
&bull; Serves as a role model to demonstrate appropriate behaviors.
&bull; Ensures and maintains the productivity level of employees.
&bull; Ensures employees understand expectations and parameters.
&bull; Establishes and maintains open, collaborative relationships with employees and ensures employees do the same within the team.
&bull; Solicits employee feedback, utilizes an &quot;open door&quot; policy and reviews employee satisfaction results to identify and address employee problems or concerns.
&bull; Leads shifts while personally preparing food items and executing requests based on required specifications.
&bull; Supervises and coordinates activities of cooks and workers engaged in food preparation.
&nbsp;
Ensuring Culinary Standards and Responsibilities are Met
&bull; Develops, designs, or creates new applications, ideas, relationships, systems, or products, including artistic contributions.
&bull; Recognizes superior quality products, presentations and flavor.
&bull; Maintains food preparation handling and correct storage standards.
&bull; Maintains purchasing, receiving and food storage standards.
&bull; Supports procedures for food &amp; beverage portion and waste controls.
&bull; Follows proper handling and right temperature of all food products.
&bull; Supervises pastry preparation shift operations and ensures compliance with all Food &amp; Beverage policies, standards and procedures.
&bull; Ensures compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.
&bull; Prepares and cooks foods of all types, either on a regular basis or for special guests or functions.
&bull; Checks the quality of raw and cooked food products to ensure that standards are met.
&bull; Assists in determining how food should be presented and creates decorative food displays.
&nbsp;
Ensuring Exceptional Customer Service
&bull; Provides services that are above and beyond for customer satisfaction and retention.
&bull; Manages day-to-day operations, ensuring the quality, standards and meeting the expectations of the customers on a daily basis.
&bull; Improves service by communicating and assisting individuals to understand guest needs, providing guidance, feedback, and individual coaching when needed.
&bull; Sets a positive example for guest relations.
&bull; Empowers employees to provide excellent customer service.
&bull; Emphasizes guest satisfaction during all departmental meetings and focuses on continuous improvement.
&bull; Strives to improve service performance.
&nbsp;
Maintaining Culinary Goals
&bull; Achieves and exceeds goals including performance goals, budget goals, team goals, etc.
&bull; Develops specific goals and plans to prioritize, organize, and accomplish your work.
&bull; Trains employees in safety procedures and supervises their ability to follow loss prevention policies to prevent accidents and control costs.
&bull; Purchases appropriate supplies and manage inventories according to budget.
&nbsp;
Supports Training and Development Activities
&bull; Ensures disciplinary procedures and documentation are completed according to Standard and Local Operating Procedures (SOPs and LSOPs) and support the Peer Review Process.
&bull; Participates in training staff on menu items including ingredients, preparation methods and unique tastes.
&bull; Reviews staffing levels to ensure that guest service, operational needs and financial objectives are met.
&bull; Ensures property policies are administered fairly and consistently.
&bull; Assists as needed in the interviewing and hiring of employee team members with appropriate skills.
&nbsp;
Additional Responsibilities
&bull; Provides information to supervisors, co-workers, and subordinates by telephone, in written form, e-mail, or in person.
&bull; Analyzes information and evaluates results to choose the best solution and solve problems.
&bull; Brings issues to the attention of the department manager and Human Resources as necessary.
&bull; Attends and participates in all pertinent meetings.

job.name: Arabic Chef
job.description:
Candidate Profile
The experience, skills and knowledge and education/certification components of the Candidate Profile should be presented as preferences rather than requirements unless an individual would not be hired for the position without these.&nbsp; Equivalent work experience may be substituted for years of experience.
&nbsp;
Education and&nbsp;Experience &nbsp;
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; High school diploma or GED; 4 years of experience in the culinary, food and beverage, or related professional area,&nbsp;OR
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2-year degree from an accredited university in Culinary Arts, Hotel and Restaurant Management, or related major; 2 years of experience in the culinary, food and beverage, or related professional area.
Leading Kitchen Operations
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Supervises and coordinates activities of cooks and workers engaged in food preparation.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Leads shifts while personally preparing food items and executing requests based on required specifications.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Utilizes interpersonal and communication skills to lead, influence, and encourage others; advocates sound financial/business decision making; demonstrates honesty/integrity; leads by example.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Encourages and builds mutual trust, respect, and cooperation among team members.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Serves as a role model to demonstrate appropriate behaviors.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Maintains the productivity level of associates.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Ensures associates understand expectations and parameters.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Establishes and maintains open, collaborative relationships with associates and ensures associates do the same within the team.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Ensures property policies are administered fairly and consistently.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Communicates performance expectations in accordance with job descriptions for each position.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Recognizes success performance and produces desired results.
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Ensuring Exceptional Customer Service
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Provides services that are above and beyond for customer satisfaction and retention.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Manages day-to-day operations, ensuring the quality, standards and meeting the expectations of the customers on a daily basis.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Sets a positive example for guest relations.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Empowers associates to provide excellent customer service.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Interacts with guests to obtain feedback on product quality and service levels.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Handles guest problems and complaints.
&nbsp;
Maintaining Culinary Goals
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Achieves and exceeds goals including performance goals, budget goals, team goals, etc.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Develops specific goals and plans to prioritize, organize, and accomplish your work.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Utilizes the Labor Management System to effectively schedule to business demands and for tracking of associate time and attendance.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Trains associates in safety procedures.
&nbsp;
Managing and Conducting Human Resource Activities
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Identifies the developmental needs of others and coaching, mentoring, or otherwise helping others to improve their knowledge or skills.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Improves service by communicating and assisting individuals to understand guest needs, providing guidance, feedback, and individual coaching when needed.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Participates in the associate performance appraisal process, providing feedback as needed.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Brings issues to the attention of the department manager and Human Resources as necessary.
&nbsp;
Additional Responsibilities
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Provides information to supervisors, co-workers, and subordinates by telephone, in written form, e-mail, or in person.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Analyzes information and evaluating results to choose the best solution and solve problems.
&middot; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Attends and participates in all pertinent meetings (e.g., Daily Stand Up, Banquet Event Orders (BEO), Pre-Cons, Staff, Forecast, Department and Intradepartmental).
&nbsp;
&nbsp;

job.name: Senior Accountant
job.description:
Kindly be informed that we are looking out for &ldquo;Senior Accountant&rdquo; :
&nbsp;
-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience:&nbsp;Minimum 10 years.

job.name: PHP Developer
job.description:
A reputed company in Bahrain is looking for a PHP developer (full time / part time) who has experience in developing&nbsp;DYNAMIC WEBSITES.
The candidate should be experienced in working with PHP based projects for at-least&nbsp;2 years and ready to join immediately.

job.name: Operations Manager
job.description:
Job Description:
?The role requires an Operations Manager to manage the operations and ensure smooth running of the establishment, while striving to increase profitability of the restaurant/caf&eacute;.&nbsp; Preferably based in the UAE with previous experience in a casual dining concept in the region. You should already be working as an Operations Manager and should be a confident leader. &nbsp;The ideal candidate should be able to lead and inspire the team in accordance with company standards and should&rdquo;
Ensure that all staff are provided with the relevant training in accordance with restaurant standards and the local laws.
Source and liaise with suppliers and always ensure that comparative quotes are obtained.
Stock and inventory control.
Controls costs by reviewing portion control and quantities of preparation; minimizing waste; ensuring high quality of preparation.
Select the best products, negotiate the best prices and manage suppliers.
Prepare estimates of all food and beverage costs, coordinate with the Owner and purchase all required supplies.
Plans menus by consulting with chefs; estimates food costs and profits
Monitor portion and waste control in collaboration with the Chef in Charge to maintain profit margins.
Maintain optimal level of sanitary procedures for all food handling.
Ensure that a neat and clean kitchen and bar area are maintained at all times.
Ensure optimal quality food of all food and beverage preparation.
Perform orientation and provide training to all new employees on restaurant procedures.
Prepare financial statements, sales and activity reports, and other performance data to measure productivity and goal achievement and to determine areas needing cost reduction and program improvement.
Manage staff, prepare weekly rosters and assign specific duties.
Organize and supervise shifts

job.name: PHP Developer
job.description: Php developer

job.name: Recruitment Manager
job.description:
Recruitment Manager Role and Key Objectives
The recruitment manager is responsible for the recruitment process. The process has to be properly designed and implemented. The manager sets recruitment measurement and distributes the job vacancies across HR Recruiters. The manager builds a healthy relationship with internal customers and external recruitment vendors.
The recruitment manager is responsible for the development of the recruitment team in Human Resources, develops successors and increases the value added by the team members.
Key Responsibilities of Recruitment Manager
Designs, develops and maintain the recruitment process in the organization (including its description, recruitment measurement definitions, regular measurement reporting, taking proper actions to close gaps)
Designs the selection matrix for choosing the optimum recruitment channel and recruitment source
Explores the market best practices in the recruitment and staffing and implement appropriate best practices in the organization
Builds a quality relationship with the internal customers and external recruitment agencies
Monitors and constantly reduces the costs of the recruitment process
Sets the social media communication strategy for different job profiles and functions in the organization
Conducts job interviews for the managerial job positions (or key jobs in the organization)
Monitors the labor legislation and implements required changes to keep the process compliant
Manages and develops the team of HR Recruiters
Acts as a single point of contact for managers regarding recruitment topics
Designs training recruitment for HR Recruiters and line managers
Key Skills
Excellent communication skills
Excellent negotiation skills
Job Interviewing Skills
Managerial&nbsp; and leadership skills
Analytical skills
Social Media Knowledge
Training Skills

job.name: Lead Consultant - Recruitment
PHP Developer - 4 yrs exp
job.description: looking for expert php developer

job.name: PHP Developer
job.description:
We are looking for a PHP developer who is dedicated to his craft, writes code that is proud of and can hit the ground running. We need you to write beautiful, fast PHP to a high standard, in a timely and scalable way that improves the code-base of our products in meaningful ways.
You will be a part of a creative team that is responsible for all aspects of the ongoing software development from the initial specification, through to developing, testing and launching.
Responsibilities
Write &ldquo;clean&rdquo;, well designed code
Produce detailed specifications
Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software and databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality
Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle
Follow industry best practices
Develop and deploy new features to facilitate related procedures and tools if necessary
Requirements
Proven software development experience in PHP
Understanding of open source projects like Joomla, Drupal, Wikis, osCommerce, etc
Demonstrable knowledge of web technologies including HTML, CSS, Javascript, AJAX etc
Good knowledge of relational databases, version control tools and of developing web services
Experience in common third-party APIs (Google, Facebook, Ebay etc)
Passion for best design and coding practices and a desire to develop new bold ideas
BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject

job.name: Accountant
job.description:
Duties:
Prepares asset, liability, and capital account entries by compiling and analyzing account information.
Documents financial transactions by entering account information.
Recommends financial actions by analyzing accounting options.
Summarizes current financial status by collecting information; preparing balance sheet, profit and loss statement, and other reports.
Substantiates financial transactions by auditing documents.
Maintains accounting controls by preparing and recommending policies and procedures.
Guides accounting clerical staff by coordinating activities and answering questions.
Reconciles financial discrepancies by collecting and analyzing account information.
Secures financial information by completing data base backups.

job.name: Accountant
job.description:
Verify, allocate, post and reconcile transactions
Produce error-free accounting reports and present their results
Analyzing financial information and summarize financial status
Provide technical support and advice on management
Review and recommend modifications to accounting systems and procedures
Participate in financial standards setting and in forecast process
Provide input into department&rsquo;s goal setting process
Prepare financial statements and produce budget according to schedule

job.name: Warranty Manager
job.description:
Essential Duties include the following.
Other duties may be assigned.
Processes warranty claims on a timely basis for each franchise or distributor.
Processes all warranty paperwork to ensure proper documentation.
Reviews Warranty Administrator&rsquo;s claims and paperwork for completion.
Assists Fixed Operations Coordinator in developing warranty policies and procedures.
Verifies criteria required by factory or distributor.
Reconciles all warranty receivables with payments through the appropriate accounting schedule.
Posts credits on computer.
Resubmits all rejected claims promptly or receives authorization to write them off.
Follows up on payment of outstanding claims.
Tracks warranty parts by tagging with repair order number, date of replacement, and date on which part may be disposed.
Arranges for parts to be shipped to the factory or distributor, or to be scrapped.
Files and maintains all service records as required by the warrantor.
Keeps informed of all factory recalls and bulletins.
Assists with any clerical needs as directed by the fixed operations manager or the controller.
Maintains a professional appearance and a neat work area.
Performs other duties as assigned.

job.name: Head of Marketing
Digital Marketing Officer
job.description:
Plan and execute all web, SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns
Design, build and maintain our social media presence
Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs)
Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the insights
Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies
Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests
Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience
Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points
Instrument conversion points and optimize user funnels
Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners
Evaluate emerging technologies. Provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriate

job.name: Automotive Mechanic Supervisor
General Manager
job.description:
To function as the Head of the profit centre for the dealership. To champion Customer Satisfaction Standards and attain objectives. To enhance Dealership image. To take policy decisions.
To deal with the overall responsibility for the business unit To set and achieve financial budget and business plans for the dealership&rsquo;s and Body Shop operations To develop and grow the business and maintain market share To seek new business growth areas, where they demonstrate synergies with the existing business To ensure profitability of the Sales, Service and Parts Departments of the dealership To provide strategic direction to each Division/Department by guiding the process of formulating Business Plans To formulate strategies for Asset Management and Inventory Control To formulate the &lsquo;Pricing Strategy&rsquo; to improve market share

job.name: Automobile Service Manager
job.description:
Maintain customer satisfaction scores at or above company standards by answering technical questions about vehicle problems, warranties, services, and repairs.
Oversee service orders and inspect quality of work to ensure that it meets specifications and established standards.
Evaluate employee performance, and recommend personnel actions such as promotions, transfers, and dismissals and maintain effective employee relations.
Order parts, tools and other stock as necessary.

job.name: Workshop Supervisor
job.description:
We are looking for Workshop Supervisor for Bahrain .
REQUIREMENTS-
Qualification - Mechanical/Automobile Eng&rsquo;g or Diploma
Experience -
1. Should have experience in MERC/MAN/HINO/ UD diesel trucks
2. Should have knowledge&amp; experience in diesel / petrol/electrical/hydraulics of vehicles and equipment.
3. Should have experience in managing team of mechanics
4. Should have GCC Work experience for a minimum of 4-5 years.
5. Should hold valid GCC Driving License
6. Energetic &amp; Hardworking&nbsp;
&nbsp;

job.name: AC Technician-Automobile
Sales Manager
job.description: Manage the inventory in the warehouse and restock when the need arises Monitor performance of parts sales against the expectations and correct any issues that may hinder them from attaining Sales targets. Ensure Timely processing of customer orders by the Sales executives and actively follow up on enquiries and issues raised to as to maintain sound client relations. Place orders for Spare parts and follow up on the same to ensure they are delivered on time and there is no shortage or overstocking. Manage the daily sales and prepare financial reports for presentation to management in regard to actual and projects sales revenues. Conduct market analysis to identify which parts are in demand and provide advice to management on stocking needs. Maintain the Shop floor and displays to meet or exceed the dealerships standards and today s customer satisfaction. Provide guidance and leadership to members of staff working under him Any other duties as may be assigned from time to time

job.name: Auto-Painter
job.description: 3-4 years of experience in repainting vehicles.

job.name: Auto Electrician
job.description:
1) Responsible to clearly understand the requirement about the task in hand through job card and as explained by the Service Engineer/ Foreman. Required to accordingly set up the tools, equipment, consumables from &nbsp;the tool room and arrange for collection parts from the parts counter.
2) Responsible to assist in diagnosis and trouble-shooting electrical complaints on the vehicles.
3) Coordinate with the tool room and Parts Counter for requisite spare parts.

job.name: Service Advisor
job.description: Service advisor with 9-14 years of experience.

job.name: Sales executive- Automotive
job.description:
Automobile Salesperson Job Duties:
Understands automobiles by studying characteristics, capabilities, and features; comparing and contrasting competitive models; inspecting automobiles.
Develops buyers by maintaining rapport with previous customers; suggesting trade-ins; meeting prospects at community activities; greeting drop-ins; responding to inquiries; recommending sales campaigns and promotions.
Qualifies buyers by understanding buyer&#39;s requirements and interests; matching requirements and interests to various models; building rapport.
Demonstrates automobiles by explaining characteristics, capabilities, and features; taking drives; explaining warranties and services.
Closes sales by overcoming objections; asking for sales; negotiating price; completing sales or purchase contracts; explaining provisions; explaining and offering warranties, services, and financing; collects payment; delivers automobile.

job.name: Area Sales in charge
job.description: Looking for an experienced &quot;Area sales in charge&quot;.
